text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Matt: Good coming. What can I do for you?
William: I'm in Room 309. I'm checking out today. Can I have my bill now?
Matt: Certainly. Please wait a moment. Here you are.
William: Thanks. Wait... What's this? The 30 dollar for?
Matt: Excuse me... The charge for your laundry service on Nov. 20th.
William: But I did't take any laundry service during my stay here. I think you have added someone else's.
Matt: Ummmm...Sorry, would you mind waiting a moment? We check it with the department concerned.
William: No. As long as we get this straightened out.
Matt: I'm very sorry. There has been a mistake. We'll correct the bill. Please take a look.
William: Okay, here you are.
Matt: Goodbye.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
text.Response A: Matt helps William check out of Room 309. There was a mistake on the bill: someone else was charged for laundry service on Nov. 20th.
text.Response B: William is checking out and asks Matt for the bill. Matt gives William a wrong bill at first then corrects it.
